name: Linko - Relaxing Loop
description:
Linko is a very simple and calming puzzle game.
All you need to prepare to play Linko is your phone and one finger.
Linko is not difficult or complicated, so anyone, regardless of age or gender, can enjoy it.
Calm your mind and proceed as if solving a simple maze.

[How to play]
Rotate the lines on the given board to connect them all.

Try it right now!


+ PS: Most of the revenue generated through the game is used for the shelter for stray cats that we manage.
